name: Tumblr B.A.P Post icons
description:
Replaces the normal tumblr post icons with B.A.P's bunnies(Matokis) and one B.A.P logo.
Post logo - Shishimato (Red - Yongguk)
Photo logo -Tatsmato (Pink - Himchan)
Quote logo - Kekemato (White - Daehyun)
Link logo - Jokomato (Yellow - Youngjae)
Chat logo - Dadamato (Green - Jongup)
Audio logo - Totomato (Blue - Zelo)
Video logo - B.A.P logo
